text:
Elizabeth L. Richeson, Ph.D., M.S. PsyPharm
Practice Summary (CV available upon request)
Licenses, Certifications, and Listings:
1. Psychologist  Texas  23899
2. Master Social Worker  Texas -11906
3. Marriage and Family Therapist  Texas  01902
4. National Register  Health Care Provider  44005
Education:
 Post doctoral M.S. Clinical Psychopharmacology
 Post doctoral Fellowship in Health & Clinical Psychology
 Ph.D. Personality Psychology
 MA. Community Clinical Psychology
 B.A. Psychology
Professional Experiences (partial listing):
1. Individual therapy (ages 10 through end of life)
2. Couples therapy (Marital, Relationship and Divorce)
3. Family therapy (intact, divorced, blended, traditional and non-traditional)
4. Workshops/PowerPoint and other (topics noted below)
5. Sexual abuse victims
6. Health psychology (working with patients with serious illnesses)
7. Eating disorders (Anorexia nervosa, bulimia nervosa, compulsive over eating)
8. Stress management
9. Group therapies
10. Psychiatric hospital staff management
11. Hospital program administration and development
12. In patient consultations (psychiatric or med-surg)
13. Associate clinical professor psychiatric residency program
14. Associate professor university psychology classes
15. Psychological testing
16. Substance abuse and dependency
17. Anxiety and panic disorders
18. Psychotropic medication consultations
Professional Affiliations (partial listing):
1. American Psychological Association
2. Texas Psychological Association, Hospital Practice Committee Chair (1993-99)
3. Texas Psychological Association (Board of Trustees 2001-04)
4. Texas Psychological Association PAC (President 1999- 2000)
5. Texas Psychologist , Editor (2004-2005)
6. El Paso Psychological Association, President 1985-86
7. El Paso County Psychological Association , Liaison Officer/ TPA - current
Partial list of workshops: Cancer & Depression, Eating Disorders, Stress Management, 
Psychotropic Medications, Communications for Couples, Codependency, Sexuality, 
Motivation, 
ALL INSURANCE CARRIERS ACCEPTED (Call for panel memberships)
